remarks: Property of a functional with a closed kernel.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lcfl2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcfl2.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfl2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfl2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcfl2.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lcfl2.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcfl2.c $e |- C = { f e. F | ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` f ) ) ) = ( L ` f ) } $.
lcfl2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcfl2.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lcfl2 $p |- ( ph -> ( G e. C <-> ( ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) ) =/= V \/ ( L ` G ) = V ) ) ) $.
$d ._|_ f $.
$d F f $.
$d G f $.
$d L f $.
